name: JamesBondTrivia
0:
”Alexa, tell James Bond Trivia to start.”
”Alexa, ask James Bond Trivia for help.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: james bond trivia
des:
From the picture-perfect filming locations to the iconic cars; from the beautiful Bond girls to the vile villains — James Bond Trivia has you covered!

∙ The perfect family-friendly trivia game for all fans of 007.
∙ Over 70 questions with new questions added weekly!
∙ Throw your hat on the rack, flirt with Moneypenny, and then promptly report to M.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
